subject: Deployin with OEM Drivers
body:
If you stand straight, do not fear a crooked shadow.

The happiness of every country depends upon the character of its people, rather than the form of its government.

The line of life is a ragged diagonal between duty and desire.

Sighing that Nature formed but one such man, and broke the die.

Self-love is a balloon filled with wind, from which storms burst forth when one makes a puncture in it.

Goals must never be from your ego, but problems that cry for a solution.

If you don't know how great this country is, I know someone who does Russia.

Oh, what a tangled web we weave, when first we practice to deceive.

Conscience is the dog that can't bite, but never stops barking.

If you love something let it go free. If it doesn't come back, you never had it. If it comes back, love it forever.

An old thing becomes new if you detach it from what usually surrounds it.

You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.

In the long run, free trade benefits everyone in the short run it is bound to produce much pain.
